column1: Kata Robata////The only thing that really bit ass about my experience was the loud
column2: obnoxious guy who was doing shots with the waitstaff AT LUNCH.  Being flirted with at the counter does not count in my book as a bonus to my my meal
column3: and I think it slowed my service down in addition.  I practically had to flag down my server to get out the door.  As long as Obnoxo-Man isn't a fixture
column4: me and Kata Robata are good.  But I got my eye on you
